resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

emkornfield commented on a change in pull request #11617:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11617#discussion_r744038249



##########
File path: dev/release/utils-binary.sh
##########
@@ -41,6 +41,7 @@ docker_gpg_ssh() {
       -i "${docker_ssh_key}" \
       -p ${ssh_port} \
       -R "/home/arrow/.gnupg/S.gpg-agent:${gpg_agent_extra_socket}" \
+      -t \

Review comment:
       what does "-t" to here?




--

   LGTM asked a question about one thing I don't understand.


--

kou commented on a change in pull request #11617:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11617#discussion_r744051080



##########
File path: dev/release/utils-binary.sh
##########
@@ -41,6 +41,7 @@ docker_gpg_ssh() {
       -i "${docker_ssh_key}" \
       -p ${ssh_port} \
       -R "/home/arrow/.gnupg/S.gpg-agent:${gpg_agent_extra_socket}" \
+      -t \

Review comment:
       This is for suppressing warnings from `gpg`:
   
   ```text
   warning: Could not set GPG_TTY to stdin: Inappropriate ioctl for device
   ```
   
   If we add `-t` here, `ssh` allocates a tty. It suppresses the warnings.




-- 
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.

To unsubscribe, e-mail: github-unsubscribe@arrow.apache.org

users@infra.apache.org

kou commented on pull request #11617:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11617#issuecomment-962373017


   @emkornfield Thanks for your review.
   
   BTW, do you know how to generate not only `.jar` but also `.pom`? It seems that we need `.pom` to upload our artifacts to https://repository.apache.org/#staging-upload . `mvn install ...` generates only `.jar`...: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/scripts/java_full_build.sh#L30


--

   According to google "-DgeneratePom=true" added to the "mvn install" should generate the POM (I don't have much experience there)


--

   Thanks!
   I tried it and found that `*.pom` are generated without it. `*.pom` are generated at `~/.m2/repository/org/apache/arrow/` not `target/`.

   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = fa6b0aab40eb910514db78cd1d641af1fa3bab35 and contender = 8df40b6301dde12ca5e334828d3328c722bbf27d. 8df40b6301dde12ca5e334828d3328c722bbf27d is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/8553b34e1a954dce8ace157e8036d7dc...443845dc5114423892d7859acba8cb68/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/27ba597f3d754825b76429abbd7b32f7...7b8d6363deb64d81ae251e147b591d63/)

   ursa-i9-9960x: langs = Python, R, JavaScript
